vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐπροσωπ-έω,
make a good show, [NT+2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to make a good impression, make a good showing impress
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to make a good impression, make a good showing impress
to carry, or make a fair appearance,good impression Gal. 6:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: quedar bien con la gente, agradar
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: phô trương; để có diện mạo tốt
